news.title: UPS stock soars on third-quarter earnings beat, turnaround plan
news.summary: UPS beat Wall Street estimates in its third-quarter earnings report. Shares of UPS soared Tuesday morning after the courier beat Wall St. estimates.

news.title: OpenAI completes restructure, solidifying Microsoft as a major shareholder
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood flags AI market correction risk: 'We think there will be a reality check'
news.summary: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood pushed back on fears of an artificial intelligence bubble. Wood: "I don't think there is a bubble in artificial intelligence"

news.title: Bill Gates softens ‘Climate Disaster’ approach, says strategy needs to shift
news.summary: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates says countries and leaders need to shift their approach to climate change. He says they need to focus on 'improving lives'

news.title: 'We're trying to shame them': Upstart activist investors target America's underperforming banks
news.summary: HoldCo has emerged from relative obscurity to launch activist investor campaigns against three regional banks. Comerica, Eastern Bank and First Interstate are among the banks targeted.

news.title: U.S. labor market was expanding in mid-October, new weekly ADP report shows
news.summary: The government shutdown has delayed the release of the September jobs report. Job growth was cooling prior to the government shutdown, which started on Oct. 1.

news.title: AI is gobbling up power and money — and sidelining this big issue, Blackstone and BlackRock CEOs say
news.summary: The biggest minds in finance weighed in on AI, investing and the U.S. economy at a Saudi Arabia conference on Tuesday. The conference was hosted by the World Economic Forum in Riyadh.

news.title: Wayfair’s stock rallies as repeat customers help lift revenue above Wall Street’s estimate
news.summary: Existing customer boosted their buying activity by nearly 7%. Total number of active shoppers dipped. Existing customers increased their buying by 7%, while active shoppers dropped by 1%.

news.title: Stablecoins are a shaky proposition for investors: Here’s what you need to know
news.summary: This so-called “safer” cryptocurrency offers some advantages to investors. But can you trust the providers? The answer is yes.

news.title: UPS has cut 34,000 jobs — a lot more than planned — and earnings show the move paid off
news.summary: UPS beat profits by the widest margin in more than four years. UPS’s stock looked to surge after the company announced it beat profits.
